entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NuGet packages need to include a README.md #74466
    17.12
  • IDE0270 creates invalid code #74460
    Backlog
  • Nonsense identifier expected error depending on how you edit unrelated code #74456
  • $$ in source code causes test always to fail #74454
  • Auto-indent doesn't work in inline diff mode #74453

Closed

  • Outlining Failing for Sub with Optional Parameter #73640
  • Methods with Optional String Parameters Won't Collapse #73798
    17.11
  • Error message for invalid 'csharp_style_namespace_declarations' is unclear #71844
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35118.130 #74458
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35118.200 #74457
  • Source Generator generated code cannot be compiled #74388

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue with ForAttributeWithMetadataName being in an inconsistent state after a match. #74468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move suppressions to code instead of .gdnsuppress #74467
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add Razor EA to remote workspace #74465
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen of `[]` for immutable arrays #74464
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.12
  • Flesh out capturing of `this` into a closure in an instance extension member. #74463
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.Build.NoTargets instead of Microsoft.Build.Traversal #74461
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Flesh out delegate creation from instance extensions #74459
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74455
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge internal release/dev17.11 back to release/dev17.11 #74446
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable running in ARM64-native mode on .NET Framework. #74285
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add more descriptive error message when editorconfig value is incorrect #74449
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove diagnostic for 'value' as a contextual keyword #74408
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Ignore MSBuild_Logs folder #74462
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup in VS generator UI code. #74448
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Dispose per-instance services created by factories #47951
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify HostAnalysisScope storage #74055
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Add monthly smoke test to release branch official builds #74447
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #74452
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #74451
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74469
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged
  • Parse `field` as a contextual keyword #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Increase driver cache size #74431
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Tests to verify ref safety bug fix #74341
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support VS System theme #74432
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Instance extensions - flesh out code gen for iterator/async methods. #74437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Document state updating #74441
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unify access to options across code style, code style fixes and feature layers #74450
  • Do not load generators in VS process #74444
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disable targeted notifications in integration tests #73987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement remaining span conversions #74420
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Put TArg before callbacks #74370
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
